channel.title: Reference on ActiveState Platform Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on ActiveState Platform Documentation

item.title: Glossary
item.description: API Build Cache CLI Compiler Environment Environment Variables Package Query Runtime Schema Source Code

item.title: Mutations
item.description: mutation Ingredient ( name : "activestate/A" src : "data:,Hello%2C%20World!" builder : "activestate/builders/concat.sh@123" args: [ "hello.txt" ] ){ id revision timestamp } Response { "data" : { "id": "AAA-83838-03030-83838", "revision": 0, "timestamp": 1234 } }

item.title: Queries
item.description: { timestamp artifacts(attime=1234, platform=macos requirements=["activestate/A"]) { name status revision urls } } Response { "data" : { "timestamp": 1234, "artifacts" : [{ "name": "activestate/A", "status": "BUILT", "revision": 0, "version": 0, "urls": ["http://activestate.com/storage/AAA-83838-03030-83838-activestate-A/hello.txt"] }] } } You can query the schema to discover details about the API interactively. Run in GraphiQL { __schema{ types { name kind fields{ name description } } } } Run in GraphiQL { __type(name:"FilmPreviousValues") { name kind description fields{ name type { kind name } } } }
